clip.quote: I asked 10 of my really good friends for 10 names each to start my database.
clip.why_clipworthy: It provides a specific, actionable strategy for new agents to build their client list.
clip.suggested_hook: Looking to expand your real estate network? Here's a simple strategy to get started!

```json
    "INSIGHT": "Leslie asked 10 of her really good friends for 10 names each to kickstart her database. This approach is simple yet incredibly effective.",
```

clip.quote: Know your competition and turn that person into a buyer for another property.
clip.why_clipworthy: Offers a practical tip on how to convert open house visitors into clients.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to turn open house visitors into clients? Here's how!

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Want to turn open house visitors into clients? Here's how!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Leslie Singer shares a game-changing tip on converting open house visitors into loyal clients. Don't miss this!",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Know your competition and turn that person into a buyer for another property. Identify their needs and match them with a listing that suits them better.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) This tactic not only helps you stand out but also builds trust. Apply it to create lasting client relationships.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to boost your client base? Start by knowing your competition. Share your thoughts in the comments!"
  },
```
